name: hidden
shortDesc: This card can't be seen by the opponent.
desc: This card can't be seen by the opponent.

name: shielded
shortDesc: This card can't be targeted.
desc: This card can't be targeted.

name: staged
shortDesc: This card can't join an Attack.
desc: This card can't join an Attack.

name: boosted
shortDesc: This card has +X of Y points.
desc: This card has +X of Y points.

name: armed
shortDesc: This card's Trap ability is ready.
desc: This card's Trap ability is ready.

name: disabled
shortDesc: This card can't be activated.
desc: This card can't be activated.

name: disrupted
shortDesc: This card can't use abilities or points.
desc: This card can't use abilities or points.

name: locked
shortDesc: This card can't be Engaged or Activated until a Key is used on it.
desc: This card can't be Engaged or Activated until a Key is used on it.

name: engaged
shortDesc: This card is engaged by another card or cards.
desc: This card is engaged by another card or cards.

name: lethal
shortDesc: The next card this Engages is Disabled immediately.
desc: The next card this Engages is Disabled immediately.

name: rapid
shortDesc: This Operator is ready the same turn that it is played.
desc: This Operator is ready the same turn that it is played.

name: camo
shortDesc: Hidden until this Engages or uses an Active ability.
desc: Hidden until this Engages or uses an Active ability.

name: shielded
shortDesc: The first instance of Attack damage that would be done to this card is negated.
desc: The first instance of Attack damage that would be done to this card is negated.

name: alert
shortDesc: This can't be targeted by opponent Contracts, Commands, or Actives.
desc: This can't be targeted by opponent Contracts, Commands, or Actives as long as you have more than 1 Mw available.

name: siphon
shortDesc: Add X Yen to your Account when this Overcomes an opponent Card.
desc: Add X Yen to your Account when this Overcomes an opponent Card.

name: harvest
shortDesc: Add X Datab to your Database when this Overcomes an opponent Card.
desc: Add X Datab to your Database when this Overcomes an opponent Card with X Datab available.

name: overkill
shortDesc: Add X to the next instance of Control removed from the HQ this turn.
desc: Add X to the next instance of Control removed from the HQ this turn.

name: intimidate
shortDesc: When this Overcomes a card, the next card you Engage this turn has -X Attack.
desc: When this Overcomes a card, the next card you Engage this turn has -X Attack.

name: piercing
shortDesc: Deal X attack when this Engages a card, once per turn.
desc: Deal X attack when this Engages a card, once per turn.

name: durable
shortDesc: This card can't be Discarded, Erased, or Removed by the opponent.
desc: This card can't be Discarded, Erased, or Removed by the opponent.

name: renewable
shortDesc: When this is Discarded, it moves to the bottom of its Owner's deck.
desc: When this is Discarded, it moves to the bottom of its Owner's deck.

name: steal
shortDesc: After this Operator overcomes an Asset, a Race is run, and if this player wins, then the Asset is stolen.
desc: After this Operator overcomes an Asset, a Race is run, and if this player wins, then the Asset is stolen.

name: singleUse
shortDesc: This can only be played (card) or activated (ability) once this match.

name: trap
shortDesc: If this isn't disarmed by using Points or Abilities then X of Y points change or Z effect is applied to target card.
desc: If this isn't disarmed by using Points or Abilities then X of Y points change or Z effect is applied to target card.

name: link
shortDesc: Gain X of Y points when you control two or more cards with Link.
desc: Gain X of Y points when you control two or more cards with Link. When overcome, all Linked cards you control in the Arena are revealed.

name: analytics
shortDesc: Gain X Datab at end of turn when you have gained 1 or more Yen that turn.
desc: Gain X Datab at end of turn when you have gained 1 or more Yen that turn.

name: enhance
shortDesc: When an opponent Install or Asset is revealed, reveal a card in their hand.
desc: When an opponent Install or Asset is revealed, reveal a card in their hand.

name: emergency
shortDesc: Draw +X Cards if this is the first Card you drew this turn.
desc: Draw +X Cards if this is the first Card you drew this turn.

name: preprod
shortDesc: Enable this card's abilities X turns after it was played.
desc: Enable this card's abilities X turns after it was played.

name: niche
shortDesc: This card can only engage X card type, type, or specific card.
desc: This card can only engage X card type, type, or specific card.

name: shard
shortDesc: Add card X to your hand at start of your next turn for Y turns or when you pay Y points.
desc: Add card X to your hand at start of your next turn for Y turns or when you pay Y points.

name: host
shortDesc: This card can have mods of type X installed on it.
desc: This card can have mods of type X installed on it.

name: clout
shortDesc: Buy X card type from the shop for Y less Yen.
desc: Buy X card type from the shop for Y less Yen.

name: profit
shortDesc: Gain X Datab or Y Yen at end of turn.
desc: Gain X Datab or Y Yen at end of turn.

name: decoy
shortDesc: When this Engages, the opposing card's abilities and effects are applied instantly but don't target this card.
desc: When this Engages, the opposing card's abilities and effects are applied instantly but don't target this card.

name: leak
shortDesc: Pay X Datab or Yen and target Asset or Install is revealed.
desc: Pay X Datab or Yen and target Asset or Install is revealed.

name: scan
shortDesc: Look at the top 3 Cards in your deck. Add 1 to your hand and place the other 2 on the bottom.
desc: Look at the top 3 Cards in your deck. Add 1 to your hand and place the other 2 on the bottom.

name: crack
shortDesc: After your opponent draws their next hand, they must discard X cards.
desc: After your opponent draws their next hand, they must discard X cards.

name: erase
shortDesc: Permanently remove a card from the game.
desc: Permanently remove a card from the game.

name: disarm
shortDesc: Deactivate a Trap without triggering it.
desc: Deactivate a Trap without triggering it. (By paying X datab)

name: disrupt
shortDesc: Target card is disabled for the remainder of the turn.
desc: Target card is disabled for the remainder of the turn.

name: procedure
shortDesc: Use X Datab in your Database to add Datab to target card.
desc: Use X Datab in your Database to add Datab to target card.

name: boost
shortDesc: Add X points of Y type on target card.
desc: Add X points of Y type on target card (using Z points, or passively at T timing).

name: drain
shortDesc: Remove X points of Y type on target card.
desc: Remove X points of Y type on target card.

name: flash
shortDesc: Remove all Statuses and Digital Mods on target Card.
desc: Remove all Statuses and Digital Mods on target Card.

name: burn
shortDesc: Remove all Mods on target Card.
desc: Remove all Mods on target Card.

name: brute
shortDesc: Win the next Race.
desc: Win the next Race.

name: key
shortDesc: Unlock target Locked card.
desc: Unlock target Locked card. (By paying X Datab)

name: lock
shortDesc: Lock target card.
desc: Lock target card. (By paying X Datab)

name: discard
shortDesc: Target card is Discarded immediately.
desc: Target card is Discarded immediately.

name: track
shortDesc: If target card has its Defense reduced to 0 or loses a race this turn, it's discarded immediately.
desc: If target card has its Defense reduced to 0 or loses a race this turn, it's discarded immediately.

name: lateral
shortDesc: This Operator may move to a neighboring stack after Overcoming a card.
desc: This Operator may move to a neighboring stack after Overcoming a card.

name: virus
shortDesc: All cards in target Stack or Team loses X Datab.
desc: All cards in target Stack or Team loses X Datab.

name: message
shortDesc: Draw X Cards.
desc: Draw X Cards.

name: hide
shortDesc: Hide target Card you control.
desc: Hide target Card you control.

name: reuse
shortDesc: Pay X Yen or Y Datab to return this to your hand.
desc: Pay X Yen or Y Datab to return this to your hand.
